### Source[generativeart by Ageokaramanis] (https://github.com/gkaramanis/aRtist/blob/main/remakes/riley/fall-1963.R)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(123)

fall <- data.frame(n = 0:105) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(x = list(seq(2, 45, 0.1)),
         s = runif(1, 0.35, 0.55)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  unnest(x) %>% 
  mutate(y = n + 2.2 * sin(6 * pi * x^(1/4)),
         s = abs(y - n)/10 + s)

ggplot(fall) +
  geom_line(aes(x = x, y = y, group = n, size = s),
            lineend = "round") +
  scale_size_identity() +
  ylim(5, 100) +
  coord_flip()  +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

ggsave(here::here("figures", "riley_fall_line.png"))
```
